OrgName.entry: HEALTHY CROSS COMMUNITY PROJECT - SELF-DIRECTED SUPPORT

Desc.entry:
Offers services to people in receipt of personal budgets (direct payments) through self directed support including help with managing money, help with support planning and help with recruiting and employing a personal assistant.
Costs are £8/£15 per hour for befrienders and buddies, £15 per hour for money management, £15 per hour for support planning and £15 per hour for advocacy. These charges are supplied by Healthy Cross, please check them yourself for accuracy.
